column10: SteelSeries Arctis Nova Pro Wireless is a premium gaming headset with active noise cancellation, 360Â° Spatial Audio, and dual batteries for uninterrupted use. Perfect for both gaming and streaming.
Logitech G Pro X Wireless is a wireless gaming headset with Blue VO!CE microphone technology, DTS Headphone:X 2.0 surround sound, and a lightweight design for maximum comfort.
Samsung 990 Pro 2TB NVMe SSD delivers blazing-fast speeds of up to 7450MB/s read and 6900MB/s write, ideal for gaming and demanding workloads.
Corsair RM1000e is a fully modular 1000W 80+ Gold-certified power supply with high efficiency, low noise, and premium components for gaming and workstation builds.
Noctua NH-D15 chromax.black is a high-end air cooler with a dual-tower design and two NF-A15 PWM fans, providing excellent cooling with low noise.
Dell UltraSharp U2723QE is a 27-inch 4K IPS monitor with USB-C hub, factory color calibration, and ComfortView Plus, ideal for professional and productivity-focused work environments.
